title: improper_ctypes ICE: ast_ty_to_ty_cache was incomplete after typeck!

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
[playpen repro](http://is.gd/w76hjp)

``` rust
extern {
    fn f(_: &(::std::any::Any + Send));
}
fn main() { }
```

```
error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic
thread 'rustc' panicked at 'ast_ty_to_ty_cache was incomplete after typeck!', ../src/librustc_lint/types.rs:391
```
